LanguageData.MakeSulfur.label: 提取硫磺
LanguageData.MakeSulfur.description: Obtain sulfur from iron ore. Sulfur occurs naturally as the pure element - native sulfur and as sulfide and sulfate minerals. It is useful for gunpowder in crafting various types ammo. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakePowder.label: 制造枪药
LanguageData.MakePowder.description: Makes gunpowder, which is useful for crafting ammo. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeNapalm.label: 制造凝固汽油弹
LanguageData.MakeNapalm.description: Creates napalm, a flammable chemical weapon. Produces 10.
